title: What is the interpretation of the dream in which I cried in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dream in which you cried in a dream? Crying is an emotion that affects a person when he is sad or upset by something. Sometimes crying is the result of strong feelings in a person, whether those feelings are the result of a moment of sadness or the result of a moment of joy, and the result is something that the person can express. Today and until today, different, we will talk about what is the interpretation of the dream in which you cried in a dream? And what are its interpretations by senior scholars. Follow us. I dreamed. That I cried in a dream: What is the interpretation of a dream that I cry in a dream? Today we will talk about crying in a dream and what its interpretations are: If a person dreams that he is crying in a dream, this indicates joy and the end of sorrows. If a person dreams that he is crying and reading the Qur’an in a dream, this indicates happiness and contentment. If a person dreams that he is crying and screaming in a dream, This means that he will fall into distress and sadness. If a woman dreams that she is crying in a dream: If a woman dreams that she is crying in a dream, this indicates her weakness. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is crying in a dream, this means that she will give birth easily, God willing. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is crying in a dream, this means that she will give birth easily, God willing. That she is crying and screaming in a dream, this means that she may give birth to a child suffering from bad symptoms. If a woman dreams that she is crying in a dream, this indicates happiness in her life. What is the interpretation of a dream in which she cried in a dream about a single girl: If an unmarried woman dreams that she She cries in a dream, this means that she will get married soon. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is crying and screaming in a dream, this means that a misfortune may befall her. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is crying over a dead person, this means that she regrets and is thinking about the past. What is the interpretation The dream in which I cried in a dream is for a man: If a man dreams that he is crying in a dream, this indicates his sadness in his life. If a man dreams that he is crying and screaming in a dream, this shows his tolerance for someone he knows. If a man dreams that he is crying at his funeral, this means that he will He will regret it in his life. If I dream that I am crying in a dream from extreme joy: If a woman dreams that she is crying in a dream from extreme joy, this indicates that she will be happy soon, God willing. If a man dreams that he is crying in a dream from extreme joy, this means that His dreams will come true. If I dream that I am crying in a dream during prayer: Whoever dreams that he is crying during prayer, this indicates his obedience and attachment to his Lord. If a person dreams that he is crying during prayer, this indicates his distance from problems, God willing. If a person dreams that he is crying during prayer, then this It means that his repentance is acceptable to God. If you dream that someone you love is crying in a dream: If you dream that someone you love is crying in a dream, this shows love and affection between them. If you dream that someone you love is crying in a dream, it means that this person is sad. If you dream that someone you love is crying in a dream, this indicates the loss of the person. If a mother dreams that she is crying in a dream: If a mother dreams that she is crying in a dream, this means that she is not fair. If a mother dreams that she is crying in a dream, this indicates that she is Sober and sad. If the mother dreams that she is crying in a dream

title: The 8 most important interpretations of seeing a wallet in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing you take a wallet? A sign of new circumstances that you are going through. What does it mean to see a heavy wallet? It indicates the quiet life you are living. What is the interpretation of seeing a wallet lost? This means that you have done something terrible and you feel guilty. What does seeing a wallet mean? Evidence of... The responsible person. What is the interpretation of seeing a wallet lost? A sign that there are people in her life who speak ill of her. Interpretation of seeing a wallet in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about getting a wallet is a sign of new circumstances that you are going through, but they are difficult circumstances, such as being fired from your job or divorcing your wife. Interpretation of a dream about losing a wallet means Financial loss or people betraying and hurting you. Losing a wallet means that you have done something terrible, and you feel guilty. Stealing a wallet means that there is someone in your life who is always taking advantage of you. To dream of losing your wallet and then find it is evidence that you are discovering new abilities in yourself. A black wallet is a dream if you are used to being Your wallet is this color, this black color may not mean anything wrong with it. If the wallet is heavy, it shows the quiet life you live. A heavy wallet means a lot of money and money makes us feel safe in life. There is no good in a light wallet, because it is evidence of wastage. Money. The wallet is evidence of a responsible person, who has many responsibilities in life. If you are a businessman, the wallet may mean that you fear losing your job or losing your money, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a bag for single women. Interpretation of a wallet in a dream for a single woman that she has a wallet In her hand, but it was stolen from her. Also, if she sees that she put the wallet somewhere, but she does not know it, this indicates that she has lost many powerful opportunities in her life. It is also evidence that she is a confused and careless girl who wastes time and does not use it for useful matters. Dream of a wallet For a married woman: Interpretation of seeing a wallet: If a woman has been married for a long time but has not yet given birth. Seeing a bag in a dream filled with a lot of money, this is a sign from Almighty God to her that she will soon give birth to a fetus. Whereas if the wallet is lost from her, this indicates that there are people in her life They talk badly about her and distort her biography among people. Interpretation of a dream about a wallet for a man: If a man sees that he found a wallet in a dream and then returns it, this indicates that he is an honest man and that his workers are righteous. Interpretation of seeing a wallet for a man means providing for children if he wants to have children. If he finds a wallet, Somewhere in a dream, it means that he will get good and big sustenance. If the wallet has a lot of money and precious stones, it means that his next life will be happy.

title: Kissing the neck in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: As for the kiss on the neck in the Virgin’s dream, it carries good and evil at the same time, and this depends on the scenario of the vision and the person who receives it in the dream, so follow us for more interpretations. Through the Dream Interpreter website. Interpretation of seeing a kiss on the neck in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing a kiss on the neck in a dream for an unmarried woman is one of the praiseworthy visions that brings her many good and positive events. If she feels that someone is kissing her neck in a dream and she cannot determine This person. This is evidence that the dreamer is about to make positive changes in his life and can find a prestigious job. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream someone she knows looking at her and kissing her neck. This means that her marriage is approaching with the person she loves if the dreamer is engaged. When Seeing an unmarried woman in her sleep as if a stranger was kissing her neck against her will. It is an indication that the dreamer will be exposed to several successive problems and crises as a result of his association with a person of bad character. Seeing a kiss on the neck from a handsome, handsome man in a dream means that you will soon hear good news. When he sees a woman Unmarried woman in her sleep, as if someone is kissing her neck in front of a crowd of people. It is an unpleasant vision and warns that the dreamer will be exposed to a major scandal. His secrets may be revealed to others, and God knows best. If a woman sees in her sleep, as if her fiancé is gently kissing her on the neck, and she is happy. It is good news. Their marriage is near, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a kiss in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a kiss on the neck of a strange man in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream, she kisses a strange man on her neck. It is a sign that the dreamer has many sins and disobedience. You always do immoral and disrespectful things. When an unmarried girl dreams that she is kissing a strange man on the neck among her family and relatives. It is a good sign that her engagement or marriage to the person she loves is approaching, and many people will attend her wedding, and God knows best. If she sees a single woman In her dream, it is as if she kisses her father on the neck, as she appreciates, respects, and loves him. But if she kisses her brother’s neck in a dream, there is a strong relationship between them and they always support each other. Interpretation of dreams: I saw my beloved in a dream kissing my neck. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that the person she loves He kisses her on the neck and she is happy about it. It is a sign of the dreamer’s happiness and satisfaction with the presence of this person in her life and she hopes that God will bring them closer to goodness. If an unmarried woman dreams that someone she loves kisses her on the neck against her will. This indicates that there are some problems and differences between them. He must understand and respect his point of view. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about a kiss on the cheek for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing a kiss on the cheek in a dream. Seeing a kiss on the cheek from a stranger in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates her forced marriage to someone she does not know much about. When a married woman sees her husband He kisses her gently on the cheek in a dream. It is a sign that her husband is always forcing her to do things that she does not want to do

title: Interpretation of a dream about hearing the news of a father’s death in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to hear the news of a father’s death in a dream Interpretation scholars have given different meanings to what we see in our dreams, with some feeling anxious or happy. The death of the father in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of hearing the news of the death of the father in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of hearing the news of the death of the father in a dream could be a sign of a period of sadness for the dreamer, and God knows best. In the event that a married man dreams of hearing the news of the death of his father, this may be an indication of the sadness he faces, but it ends, and God knows best. I know the unseen. If a married woman sees and hears the news of her father’s death in a dream, this may be a sign of a difficult period, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. It may express that she is going through a difficult time, but it does not last long, and God knows the unseen. I dreamed that I killed someone and went to prison in a dream. I dreamed that I killed someone and went to prison in a dream. We did not find specific explanations to see that if the dreamer sees himself committing a murder, this may mean that he is thinking about acquiring something, and God knows best, as there may be evidence of the thought of power, and God knows the unseen. If a young man is seen committing a murder, this may indicate his thinking about power, God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the blood of a dead person in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the blood of a dead person in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing someone killed in a dream could be a sign of stress, and God knows the unseen. Seeing a dead person indicates psychological pressure, and God knows the unseen. When you see a dead son, it may be good for him, and God knows the unseen. If a young man sees a dead son in In a dream, this may be a sign of stress in his life, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing my corpse in a dream. However, seeing corpses in a dream could be a sign of the loss of a loved one, and God knows best. In the event that the dreamer sees corpses, it may That it leads to unwanted changes, and God knows best. And because seeing the corpse of a married woman may indicate separation, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of a rotting corpse in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a rotting corpse in a dream. To see a rotting corpse in front of the house could indicate bad things, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. In the event that the dreamer sees a rotting corpse in front of the house. It may lead to a bad life, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees rotting corpses, it may indicate bad friends, and God knows best. When a single girl sees rotting corpses, it could be a sign of failure, and God knows everything that is unseen. Interpretation of a dream of children’s corpses in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of children’s corpses in a dream. The body of a strange child can be a sign of freedom from anxiety, and God knows the unseen. When you see the body of a child you do not know, it expresses freedom from anxiety. If the dreamer sees the body of a child he knows in a dream, it may be a sign of anxiety, and God knows the unseen. Where if a married man sees the body of a child he knows, he may It is a sign of anxiety and sadness, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. title: Interpretation of a bottle in a dream A bottle of water in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of a dream about an empty bottle, seeing bottles for a single woman, according to Ibn Sirin, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, drinking from a bottle. Interpretation of a bottle in a dream: The bottle in a dream indicates a maid or a boy. In some of the famous interpretations adopted by the Arabs, the bottle in a dream indicates a woman because he, may God’s prayers and peace be upon him, said (Leave it with the bottles). It was also said that the bottle or bottle in a dream is a woman who does not keep secrets, and it may indicate sickness or illness, and a vulgar woman. Or vile and a bottle of urine “God forbid” should have a woman asking for debauchery, as well as a bottle of wine. Sometimes a large number of bottles in a dream indicates a large number of men or children and in other places it indicates gossip and knowledge of people’s secrets or secrets. Bottles in a dream also indicate people who have no affection or loyalty. As for someone who sees in his dream that he broke a bottle, then strife will come out of his home. It is not good to interpret or express dreams, and take wine bottles from the dead. The bottle or bottle in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. The bottle in the dream Or the vision is interpreted by the servant, and whoever sees in his dream that he has a bottle of water to drink, then this is his interpretation of the money from that servant or tenant. Interpretation of a jug or flask in one dream. Interpretation of the bottle in the dream according to what the liquids or drinks contain. If an unmarried woman sees a bottle or a bottle of perfume in her dream, this is in the interpretation of good news or good news. The bottle contains milk, honey, or water, as this is a legitimate livelihood, God willing. It is not appropriate to interpret the vision of wine bottles, because they indicate the most evil people, and every bottle contains contaminated water, mold, or tooth, so a person appears in the dream without morals or chivalry. As he hates it. In the interpretation, you see bottles filled with snakes, scorpions, or insects because they express their owners’ disorder and cunning. Medicine bottles are praised in the vision because they represent a cure or death for problems and worries. Interpretation of the bottle in a married woman’s dream. It is a praiseworthy matter in a dream for a married woman to see ceramic bottles, because in The interpretation expresses maintaining trust and hiding secrets. As for plastic or glass bottles, it often expresses or suggests people who are not worthy of the viewer's trust. A married woman may infer in a dream the meaning of a flask or bottle with its liquids. A married woman may also discover the meaning of her dream through the shape or color of the bottle. It is good to see colored bottles in a dream or used for decoration, because they may express the joy of life. And decorated bottles may indicate money or children. It is also good in the interpretation for a married woman to see a bottle of luxurious crystal, because it can express the possession of something valuable that she wants. A closed bottle in a dream is better than an empty or empty bottle, because the closed container in the interpretation expresses About preservation and safety. A bottle or a bottle in a dream

It is also good in the interpretation for a married woman to see a bottle of luxurious crystal, because it can express the possession of something valuable that she wants. A closed bottle in a dream is better than an empty or empty bottle, because the closed container in the interpretation expresses About preservation and safety. A bottle or a bottle in a dream

title: What is Ibn Sirin's interpretation of seeing black cats in a dream?

preview.html: Black cats in a dream, seeing black cats in a dream is one of the visions that cause stress and anxiety to the dreamer, but it carries within it many indicators, such as those that lead to good news and abundance of luck, and others that only bring sorrows and truths. All the details about seeing black cats will be presented in the following article. Black Cats in a Dream There are many interpretations and meanings related to seeing a black cat in a dream and they are as follows: If the dreamer sees a black cat in his dream, he will suffer from failure and repeated disappointments in all aspects of his life, which will lead to It leads to permanent sadness. If a person sees in his dream a cat walking in the opposite direction from him, this is clear evidence that he is far from God, destroying his life and tending to follow the desires of the soul, and you need to stop it and return to God before it is too late. Interpretation of a dream about killing a black cat It means the death of anxiety, the elimination of anxiety, and the revelation of sadness in the near future. If someone dreams of being scratched by black cats, this is clear evidence that she will suffer from a serious illness that will leave her bedridden, which will negatively affect her psychological state. If someone sees in a dream that cats are attacking them, then this A clear sign that they are in crises and difficulties that are difficult to get out of. Black cats in a dream by Ibn Sirin. There are many interpretations explained by the scholar Ibn Sirin, the most important of which are the following: If the dreamer sees in a dream that a black cat is attacking him, but it fails, then this is a clear indication that he is going through difficulties and periods. Full of negative events, but they will not last long and he will overcome them easily. If someone sees in a dream a black cat howling, this is clear evidence of the presence of a malicious friend who pretends to have feelings for him and harbors hatred and resentment in reality and wants to die. What is the meaning of black cats in a single woman’s dream? An unmarried woman seeing black cats in a dream has many meanings, the most important of which are the following: If a girl who has never been married sees a black cat in her dream, this is a clear indication that she will enter into a toxic relationship that will bring her unhappiness and problems. The interpretation of a dream about a black cat’s tail in a dream For a girl who has never been married before, it symbolizes that God will grant her success and payment in all aspects of her life. If a virgin sees a pregnant black cat in her dream, this is a sign that she will receive a curse in the afternoon from the people closest to her. If the dreamer is a girl who is not related and she sees a black cat In her dream, this is clear evidence that she is envied and that she should be fortified with the Qur’an so that she will not be harmed. Seeing a never-married girl expelling a black cat from her house indicates that her relationship with a series of corrupt companions has been severed, which has led her into trouble. What is the interpretation of black cats? In a dream for a married woman? A married woman seeing black cats in a dream has many meanings and symbols, the most important of which are the following: If the dreamer gets married and sees this black cat in her dream, this is a clear indication that she is living a life full of unhappiness and unhappiness due to the incompatibility between her and her husband in reality. Interpretation of a dream about a cat

title: Interpretation of a dream about a driver in a dream

preview.html: The driving profession is considered one of the most important professions that cannot be overlooked all over the world, and many dreamers are surprised and confused when they see the driver in their dreams and they desperately need to know the meaning of this dream and the meanings and interpretations that it carries with it. In this article, we will put in your hands all the interpretations, whether for men or women. For women. Interpretation of seeing a driver in a dream for a single woman. There are many different interpretations and meanings of seeing a driver in a dream and we will explain them to you in the following lines as follows: If a single woman is driving a car with a driver she knows well, this means that she needs help and assistance from this man. The presence of an unmarried woman in a car driven by a slow driver symbolizes the failure of this girl to reach her dreams and aspirations and shows that this girl is suffering from a major failure in her life. This girl must turn to God, sincerely intend to Him, seek forgiveness, perform the obligatory rituals, and work hard. She works hard and sincerely. Driving a single woman in a car driven by a chauffeur at high speed symbolizes this girl’s vitality and determination, as well as the fulfillment of all her dreams. Some dream interpretation scholars have reported that the appearance of a driver in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of this girl’s connection or marriage to a person with Low social status. Seeing an unmarried woman in her dream next to a driver driving a luxury car is a sign that this girl will marry someone who has a high social status and a prominent position in society. The unmarried woman who gets into the car being driven by the driver looks at her with a strange look and wants to harm her in the future. The dream symbolizes many problems and obstacles that she will face in her life. A single woman riding next to a driver with beautiful features in a luxury and luxurious car in a dream indicates her imminent marriage or engagement in the coming days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a driver in a dream for a married woman. We point out the most prominent indicators and various meanings. What a driver’s dream carries in a married woman’s dream, and we will shed light on the driver in general and on the private driver in the following lines as follows: The appearance of a private driver in a married woman’s dream indicates the good feelings and intimate relationships that bind her to her husband. For an unmarried woman who drives a car driven by its driver at high speed It symbolizes many family problems that cannot be controlled. In general, a married woman driving a car with a driver indicates some positive changes that changed the course of her life to a better condition than it is. The driver’s attempt to harm the married woman in the car he is driving shows obsession and fear. Which controls her as a result of fear of the future. Interpretation of seeing a driver in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing a driver for a married woman differs from seeing a pregnant and unmarried woman, and seeing a driver in a pregnant woman’s dream has many interpretations, which we explain as follows: In general, seeing a driver in a woman’s dream Pregnant woman indicates the happiness, joy and cheerfulness that she will feel

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about finding and bringing coins according to Ibn Sirin?  Interpretation of a dream about finding and receiving banknotes and interpretation of a dream about finding foreign currencies

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of finding and receiving coins is one of the dreams that have many different interpretations, because obtaining money and achieving a stable financial level is the desired dream that many seek to achieve. If this is realistic, what does it mean in the dream? Does it have the same meaning or a different interpretation? We know this in detail, referring to the opinions of the greatest commentators, in our next article. Interpretation of a dream about finding coins and bringing them by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about finding and receiving coins? The interpretation of seeing coins in a dream varies depending on the situation in which the dreamer found them. If the dreamer sees a large number of coins on the street and picks them up, this is a good sign that he will be able to achieve his desired goals. But if the fortuneteller finds coins in his house and does not know their source, this is an indication of the occurrence of many family disputes and exposes him to many obstacles that affect On his relationship with his family and relatives. The fortuneteller found coins with a bright golden color, which is a sign of a radical change in the course of his life, but for the better, and it may be a sign that he is traveling to another place to get a new life. But if the fortuneteller finds coins, but Rust surrounds it, and taking it, this is a shameful vision that portends a great financial loss, the loss of his business, or his entry into an unprofitable project. Interpretation of the dream of finding coins and bringing them by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that the vision of finding coins and receiving them is a good dream that brings the viewer a lot of joy. Goodness and livelihood and many obstacles and problems end. The fortune teller finds coins and takes them, then counts them in a dream and finds an even number. It is a good vision that indicates that the dreamer will be able to reach a position of power and high status. No. It is a warning to the visionaries to stay away from making money from illegal sources. It symbolizes the vision of finding coins and taking them and then reaching their owner, and he was a person known to the dreamer. It is a sign that this person is exposed to a difficult financial crisis and needs help from the fortuneteller. Through Google you can be with us, the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site, and Visions, and you will find everything you are looking for. Interpretation of a dream about finding coins and carrying them for a single woman. Finding a large number of coins with a shiny appearance for a single woman is a good sign of her relationship with someone she loves and who enjoys an easy financial situation. With him, she will enjoy a good, stable life. Seeing a single woman who found and took coins, and these coins were of different colors, indicates that she is suffering from many problems and faces many obstacles on the way to achieving her future goals. If the unmarried woman is going through a stage in which her health is deteriorating She saw in her dream that she found coins, so this is a sign of the end of that period and an improvement in her health. And complete recovery. An unmarried woman who found coins and when she took them and found them to be counterfeit symbolizes that she is surrounded by a group of fake people.

title: Interpretation of seeing carrots in Nabulsi’s dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing carrots in a dream: Whoever sees in a dream that he is eating carrots in the dream interpretation is that the man or the sleeper will get many good things in the coming period. Interpretation of seeing carrots in a dream by Nabulsi: If the sleeper sees that he is holding carrots in his hands, this means, and God knows best, that the sleeper will face many difficulties, but they It will pass, God willing. Seeing peeling carrots in a dream: If an unmarried woman sees that she is cutting or peeling carrots with a sharp knife, in the interpretation of the dream, and God knows that she will end her relationship with a close person. But if a married woman sees that she is peeling carrots, in the dream interpretation that she is chasing her husband or saying bad things. About him in front of people. If a person dreams that he is peeling and cutting carrots, the dream means that his livelihood will be cut off from children and money, and God knows best. But if a politician or a high-ranking person sees carrots in the islands, this indicates that this person will face a number of strong and difficult problems, but he will overcome them. But if a man is from the common people and sees carrots in a dream with carrots here, this means that he will stumble in the coming period, but he will face these circumstances and difficulties. But if the man is imprisoned or in distress, carrots here bring relief and he gets out of distress and imprisonment as well. If the corrupt person sees carrots in In a dream, the dream is a sign from God, Blessed and Most High, of the necessity of stopping bad deeds so that the end is not bad. Carrots in a woman’s dream. If a married woman only sees carrots in a dream, the interpretation of the dream is that her husband will be exposed to anxiety or a financial crisis, but she will stand by him and support him. And if she sees A working woman sees carrots in the interpretation of pregnancy, so she will get what she is looking for from dreams and ambitions. But if an unmarried woman sees carrots in a dream, this is evidence that she is suffering from stress and tension because of that. Things that do not actually exist. It is just her imagination. But if an unmarried woman sees carrots In a dream, the interpretation of the dream is that a first-degree relative will suffer some misfortune, but he will not be able to help him enough, and God Almighty is higher and knows better. We have explained to you a number of interpretations of seeing carrots in a dream for both women and men in the places where they see them. They cut, buy, and eat carrots, and God knows best.

title: Interpretation of giving a prayer rug in a dream to a married woman

preview.html: Or taking a good step, but some visions differ, including what indicates the dreamer’s disobedience to God and not performing prayer. Interpretation of a vision of giving a prayer rug in a dream to a single girl. A single girl dreamed that she was buying a new prayer rug in a dream. The dream indicates that the girl will repent to God and stop praying. The act of sin that you commit every day. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream a stranger whom she does not know, she will give her a prayer rug and the rug is dirty with dust. The vision shows a lot of goodness that the girl will receive after going through a period of severe suffering. Seeing a single woman buying a prayer rug New in a dream and gives that rug to someone you know in a dream. The vision is good news for an unmarried girl about her good deeds. If an unmarried girl dreams that she buys a prayer rug in a dream in large quantities, and gives many of them to passers-by on the street. The dream indicates that the girl will accept a good deed that will To change the course of her life. An unmarried girl dreams that she is looking for a prayer rug in a dream, so the vision indicates the delay of her marriage and the emergence of major problems and crises. The dream of an unmarried girl praying on a prayer rug in a dream in a mosque, means her engagement or marriage soon. See also: Interpretation Seeing prayer in a dream and its importance to Nablus: Interpretation of seeing a prayer rug given to a married woman in a dream. A married woman sees that she buys a new prayer rug in a dream and then presents it to her husband to pray on it. The vision shows that she is a righteous woman who helps her husband by getting closer to God Almighty. If a married woman dreams that she buys a lot From Hajj to pray in a dream, she agrees to donate it. The dream shows that the lady will get closer to God and stop the shameful actions she is doing behind her husband’s back. Buying a prayer rug in a dream for a married woman and it was dirty and she gave it to someone. The vision shows that the married woman will face many Of problems, which is the result of the interference of an evil person in her life. If a married woman sees that she is praying in a dream on a rug with many holes. The vision shows that the woman is far from God and is committing many sins. If a married woman sees a prayer rug in a dream, this indicates Umrah. Next. If the carpet is red and the woman is pregnant, the vision indicates a female birth. Giving the carpet in a dream to a married woman, then spreading it out to pray for her, her husband, and her family. The vision shows the family bond between them and blessings for the family members. Interpretation of a vision of giving a prayer rug in a dream to a man and its meaningGiving a rug A prayer in a man’s dream for someone he loves. The dream indicates that the dreamer will help a person close to him in a major problem. Buying a prayer rug in a man’s dream in large quantities and then giving it away with the intention of donating it to mosques. The dream indicates that the man will do many good deeds in real life. The interpretation of the vision differed for a man who does not pray and sees in a dream that someone is giving him a prayer rug and then sees its attractive shape. The dream shows the person’s good condition and his closeness to Almighty God. If
